text: @realDonaldTrump Which you felt were fake because you live in a fantasy. Most Americans think you’re terrible at your job, that you only care about yourself, that 112,000+ citizens have died from Covid19 on your watch, and that you’re a racist. The numbers aren’t fake. You’re a disaster. Resign.
